title: Firm told to scrap Heathrow immigration centre 'ballooncraft' job
description: Home Office minister Seema Malhotra has called on the contractor to remove the jobs at the immigration removal centre.
content:

title: M20 traffic LIVE: Delays as motorway CLOSED in Kent following horrific crash
description: National Highways has confirmed the M20 is shut westbound this morning between junction nine for Ashford and junction eight for Hollingbourne, both in Kent, following an accident
content:
Commuters face long delays this morning following a horror crash on a motorway into London.
